name: Game A Week 2 - Bored At Work Pong
name_original: Game A Week 2 - Bored At Work Pong
description: So again I only left myself the last bit of the last day for the game a week challenge... oops... but I'm pretty proud as this time I had even less time... starting only 5 hours before the deadline... which seems a bit much for Pong... but I've never used visual basic! That's this weeks theme, expand your tool set, use something you haven't used before to make a game!
